ygData.subject: Re: ROS already open for ToeThread
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Gordon, Thank you for the prompt reply.  I was not using the ExtractorUniversal.  However, I was able to find the bug - it was an open ReplayInputStream

Hello Gordon,

Thank you for the prompt reply.  I was not using the 
Extrac=
torUniversal.  However, I was able to find the bug - it was an 
open Replay=
InputStream in my application code.

I sincerely apologize for the inconven=
ience.

Thank you, again.

Purvesh.
